required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: in Patients With SCAD Undergoing Complex PCI, the RESPONSE Study"
clinical_study.official_title: "Efficacy and Safety of Oral/iv Therapy (Cangrelor) in Patients With SCAD Undergoing Complex PCI, the RESPONSE Study"

brief_summary.textblock:
Evaluation of Efficacy/Safety in Cangrelor use in patients with SCAD undergoing complex PCI.
Prospective, observational, multicenter registry.

detailed_description.textblock: SCAD patients routinely in the Italian centers undergo complex PCIs with pre-treatment with P2Y12 inhibitors or with P2Y12 inhibitors administration after procedure. This implies that participants receive interventions as part of routine medical care, and that researchers actually observe the effect of the intervention.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety endpoint: Major bleedings according with Thrombolysis in Myocardial Infarction (TIMI) classification.
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with intracranial hemorrhage or a ≥5 g/dl decrease in hemoglobin concentration or a ≥15 % absolute decrease in hematocrit.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy endpoint: Long-term major adverse cardiac and cerebrovascular events MACCE (eg Death from any cause, Any Myocardial infarction, Revascularization, Stroke)
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients with Long-term major adverse cardiac and cerebrovascular events (MACCE) (e.g. Death from any cause, Any Myocardial infarction, Revascularization, Stroke)
Assessment of platelet reactivity measured by the VerifyNow® P2Y12 assay. Pharmacodynamic measurements will occur according to manufacturer instructions before, during, and after study drug infusion.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with stent thrombosis
secondary_outcome.description: Number of Participants with stent thrombosis demonstrated by coronary angiography

secondary_outcome.measure: Rehospitalisation due to unstable or progressive angina according to the Braunwald Unstable Angina Classification and the Canadian Cardiovascular Society Angina Classification.
secondary_outcome.description: Rehospitalisation due to unstable or progressive angina according to the Braunwald Unstable Angina Classification and the Canadian Cardiovascular Society Angina Classification.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG)
secondary_outcome.description: Time between the intervention and the Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG)

arm_group.arm_group_label: PCI with pre-treatment with P2Y12 inhibitors
arm_group.description: SCAD patients undergoing complex PCI with pre-treatment with P2Y12 inhibitors will undergo: Assessment of platelet reactivity (Time 0, T0) (VFN) PCI (start = T1; end= T2)

arm_group.arm_group_label: PCI with treatment with P2Y12 inhibitors only after procedure.
arm_group.description: SCAD patients undergoing complex PCI with treatment with P2Y12 inhibitors only after procedure will undergo: Administration of Cangrelor (bolus + infusion of at least 2 hours and at least until end of PCI) or decision to not administer (T0) Assessment of platelet reactivity (Time 0, T0) (VFN) PCI (start of PCI= T1; end of infusion of Cangrelor= T2)

study_pop.textblock: Patients with SCAD undergoing complex PCI
